name: Estimated Reading Time
body:
### About Estimated Reading Time Joomla Plugin
This plugins allows Joomla! site owners to display the estimated reading time for Joomla! articles.

### Installation
This plugin is installed as a regular Joomla Plugin, so just grab the installation package and put it into your Joomla! Extension installer and click install.

### Usage
After installing the plugin go to the plugin manager in your Joomla! site and click on the plugin name for configuring it.

### Translation Credits
Estimated Reading Time plugin is available in English, Spanish and Dutch. Thanks to:

* Dutch - **Wouter Franken**
* Spanish - **Carlos CÃ¡mara** (Yes! it's me!!) ;)

If you want to become a translator, please let me know contacting me through email (see below) or just applying in our Transifex project page: https://www.transifex.com/organization/carcam/dashboard/plugin-estimated-reading-time

### Help needed
This is a really tiny non-profit project but it would be great to have a fancy logo so please contact me if you have a logo proposal or any idea about how the logo for the plugin should be.

Also as stated in above, we need help so if you speak a language which is not listed above, please send me a line ;).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Estimated Reading Time Plugin? Please write an issue using the links provided ;).

If you just want to say thank you or want to share something with me, please contact me at carlos@hepta.es .
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
